rooms.name: Main Hall/Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan area merging living space and kitchen with a Kerala-style traditional feel. Incorporates natural ventilation and ample daylighting, adhering to Vastu by positioning the main entrance in the north direction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom for parents with integrated dressing area. Positioned in the northeast sector to enhance family harmony and wealth.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for the children. Designed to be quiet and conducive for study with a view.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom for guest or child use. Placed in the southwest area to support relaxation and emotional well-being.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom ensuring privacy and ample space. Located in the northwest zone for stability.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space with ample shelving for books, providing a quiet retreat within the living area.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: An outdoor swimming pool area designed with landscaping and seating zones. Positioned to provide privacy while adhering to building norms.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Designed to be efficient with ample storage and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact utility room for laundry, storage, and cleaning supplies.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: A guest toilet facility positioned conveniently near the main living area.

rooms.name: Washroom for Bedrooms
rooms.description: Bathroom facilities adjoining the bedrooms to ensure privacy and convenience.

rooms.name: Cloakroom
rooms.description: A small entrance cloakroom with shoe storage for visitors.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large door positioned in the north, ensuring a welcoming and energy-positive entry.

openings.name: French Windows
openings.description: Windows that open to the kitchen area, providing natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Door leading to an adjoining balcony in Bedroom 3 for fresh air.
